compliant.section: We will notify You of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
compliant.legal provisions: Principle of transparency, data subject rights to information

compliant.section: You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.
compliant.legal provisions: Principle of transparency, data subject rights to information

non_compliant.section: We will let You know via email and/or a prominent notice on Our Service, prior to the change becoming effective and update the "Last updated" date at the top of this Privacy Policy.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Consent to changes of privacy policy should be explicit, not just through continued use. GDPR requires a clear and affirmative action from the user to signify their acceptance of the updated policy.
non_compliant.amend:
While informing users about changes is good, GDPR requires explicit consent for changes to the privacy policy, especially if the changes involve increased processing of personal data.  

Suggested amendment:

"We will seek your explicit consent before the change becoming effective if the changes materially impact your rights or how we process your personal data. Otherwise, continued use of our service after the effective date constitutes your acceptance of the updated Privacy Policy."
